item.description:
Dimitry Neyshtadt, of Successful Anonymous Networking, and Doreen Nicastro, of Networlding Boston, invite you for an evening of professional and social networking during the holiday season to celebrate our professional and personal success and philanthropy. We are encouraging people to donate to Toys for Tots.

Entrance fee is $10 to cover cost of appetizers. Bring an unwrapped toy of $10 value and receive free admission.

How is social media transforming your professional and personal life? How can we use Social Media to support each other, our causes and our business in the new year? Share your experiences and bring your ideas.

This event is still being developed with additional networking groups, organizations, professionals, and companies - so LET US KNOW if you'd like to be more active in the planning of the event, and we'll be happy to SHINE A SPOTLIGHT on your business!

Location:
Rudi's Cafe and Bar - AKA - Verve Lounge
811 Mass Ave
Boston, MA
Right next to Boston Medical Center
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in the private room :o)
item.name: "Social Networking for Social Good" - Networking Event
